description:
Play puzzles from Picross e7 on the Nintendo 3DS™ in Picross S+.

・Picross 150 puzzles
・Mega Picross 150 puzzles
・Clip Picross 3 puzzles

New bonus puzzles will be added to your Gift Box .
・Picross 3 puzzles
・Mega Picross 3 puzzles
・Color Picross 1 puzzles

*Micross puzzles will be arranged and included as Clip Picross puzzles.
*This content requires the full game, which is sold separately.
name: DLC "Picross e7"
